project.name: RealYield
project.tagline: Compliant, Privacy-Preserving Yield Vaults for Real-World Assets on Mantle
project.goal: Create a secure, composable platform on Mantle Network where verified users can tokenize real-world assets, deposit into yield-bearing vaults, and withdraw earnings using ZK proofs — combining compliance with user privacy.
project.problem_statement: Access to compliant DeFi investment products remains fragmented, with high gas costs and opaque custody. Investors and asset issuers lack a scalable on-chain infrastructure for verified, yield-bearing real-world assets (RWA).
project.solution_overview: RealYield leverages Mantle's modular architecture to tokenize verified RWA (invoices, real estate, bonds) as NFTs, pool them into ERC-4626 vaults, and distribute yield with ZK-protected, KYC-attested withdrawals.
project.unique_value: The first Mantle-native RealFi vault combining ERC-1155 asset tokenization, ERC-4626 vault composability, ZK selective disclosure, and automated compliance enforcement.

layers.name: Frontend (User Interface)
layers.framework: Next.js 15 with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

design_theme.mode: Auto light/dark based on system preference

pages.title: Home / Dashboard
sections: Live Vault Stats: TVL, APY, Depositors, Yield Distributed

pages.title: Vault Dashboard
pages.layout: Grid layout (3 cards per row, responsive)

pages.title: Vault Details
components: Vault metadata: name, APY, strategy type, risk score, custodian

ui: KYC proof upload field (auto-generated if verified)
Confirm transaction modal (shows gas fee, estimated yield)
ZK Proof Selector: choose proof or generate new
components.UX_flow: 1. User clicks withdraw → 2. System checks KYC attestation → 3. ZK proof auto-generated → 4. Contract verifies proof → 5. User signs → 6. Success toast

pages.title: KYC Verification Flow
steps: Step 3: Attestation signing — backend signs JWT bound to wallet public key
Step 4: Confirmation screen with hash of attestation stored on Mantle
pages.UX_flow: Once verified, wallet is flagged as KYC-verified; this proof can be reused to deposit or withdraw.

pages.title: ZK Proof Manager
components: List of previous proofs (status: verified / pending)
pages.animations: fade-in on list update, confetti burst on new proof

contracts.name: AssetTokenizer.sol
contracts.purpose: Tokenize verified RWAs with metadata URI and compliance linkage
functions: mintAsset(address owner, string metadataURI, bytes attestationHash)

contracts.name: Vault.sol
contracts.purpose: Aggregate yield-bearing RWAs and distribute earnings

contracts.name: ComplianceModule.sol
contracts.purpose: Manage KYC-attested wallets and jurisdictional access control

contracts.name: YieldDistributor.sol
contracts.purpose: Automated yield distribution across vault participants

contracts.name: ZKVerifier.sol
contracts.purpose: On-chain verifier for selective disclosure proofs

layers.name: Backend / API Layer
services: KYC Provider (Simulated or API-based, returns signed JWT)
ZK Proof Generator (runs Circom circuit for withdrawal proofs)
Price Oracle Feeds via Chainlink or Mantle-compatible API
MongoDB for storing encrypted off-chain metadata

security.signature_verification: JWT + ECDSA bound to wallet public key

layers.name: Data Availability & Indexing
components: Mantle DA for metadata and yield distribution proofs
The Graph subgraph for analytics (deposits, vault yields, KYC status)

onboarding_flow: 1. User lands on dashboard → clicks 'Launch App'
3. If KYC not verified → redirect to /kyc
4. After verification → auto-mint KYC attestation hash on-chain
5. Redirect to dashboard showing available vaults
deposit_flow: User selects a vault → enters amount → frontend checks KYC hash → transaction preview modal → confirm → deposit success animation → balance updates live.
withdrawal_flow: User clicks Withdraw → ZK Proof Generator modal appears → user signs challenge → backend produces proof → smart contract verifies → funds released → confirmation toast.
kyc_flow: Document upload → backend encrypts + signs → attestation minted on-chain → user notified success.
proof_generation_flow: User initiates proof generation → backend runs Circom circuit → proof hash stored on Mantle → user sees proof as verified.

ui_states.animations: Framer Motion transitions for modals and card hovers, shimmer loading placeholders, confetti bursts on success

testing_pipeline.smart_contracts: Hardhat + Chai unit tests for each function
testing_pipeline.frontend: Cypress E2E for deposit, withdraw, proof verification flows
testing_pipeline.deployment: GitHub Actions → deploy to Mantle testnet via Alchemy RPC

mantle_integration.data_availability: Mantle DA SDK for metadata and proofs
